name: ArtiFISHial
description:
Gameplay Summary

Collect balloons. Shoot Plastic. Defend Fish.  This is the core gameplay of ArtiFISHial. Try to survive as long as you can!

Lore

New eco-friendly biodegradable balloons are being put to the test cleaning up trash in the ocean. You play as the robot T.U.N.A. (Trusty Underwater Navigation AI), and along with your epic science team are sailing out into the middle of the ocean where you will protect the fish from getting caught in the trash! But be careful, you can also get caught! You will see bags of the biodegradable balloons coming your way but don't worry if you miss one because they will just become fish food.

Controls

Use your up and down arrow keys or W & S to move and space to deploy the balloons at the trash to be sent to be picked up at the surface.

Other notes

For 2/3 people that made this game, this was their first ever game! And for all of us it was our first game jam! Thanks to Team Seas for hosting this fun Jam!
